hero.description: Belimuno Jobs platformaa hiree HRaa Itoophiyaa keessatti kan caaltuudha, hojjettoota qophaa'aan qaban waliin daldaltoota magaalaa hunda keessatti hidha. Kumoota hojjettoota mijataa hojii isaanii ijaaruu keessatti walitti qabanii.

stats.title: Lakkoofsa Platformaa
stats.subtitle: Dhiibbaa nuti Itoophiyaa hunda keessatti barbaachisu argadhu

featuredJobs.title: Hojiiwwan Agarsiifaman
featuredJobs.subtitle: Carraawwan gammachuudhaan hiriyoota hojii ol'aantota irraa argadhu

step1.title: Akkaawuntii Uumu
step1.description: Hojii barbaachuuf hojjettootaaf yoo ta'ee proojektii maxxansuuf maamilaa ta'een galmaa'i

step2.title: Waliin Hojji & Hojjechisu
step2.description: Carraawwan ilaali, piroopoosaalaa kenni, fi proojektii sirrii ta'een walitti makamadhu

step3.title: Kaffaltiidhaan Argadhu
step3.description: Proojektota xumuri fi kaffaltii nagaa platformaa keenya irraa argadhu

cta.title: Imalaa Keessan Jalqabuu Ready Ta'anii?
cta.subtitle: Kumoota hojjettoota mijataa career isaanii fudhachuuf Belimuno Jobs fayyadamuu keessatti walitti qabanii.
